mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment(payment_no, mem_no, at_no,cart_no, payment_way, payment_total, payment_date, cart_cnt, at_price,at_name) VALUES(payment_seq.nextval, #{mem_no}, #{at_no}, #{cart_no}, #{payment_way}, #{payment_total}, sysdate, #{cart_cnt}, #{at_price},#{at_name})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM payment WHERE payment_no = #{payment_no} AND mem_no=#{mem_no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM payment
